Osa Conservation: Movement data audit Part 1 Database changes

Osa Conservation: Movement data audit Chris Beirne Part 1 Database changes This document summarizes data contained with the movement ecology database as of 2023-04-03. 1.0.1 Database changes (last 7 days) The following table shows total number of observations in each database (left) and the new records from the last 7 days (right). The green numbers show where records have been added.
